about_the_game:
Music by Jim Guthrie and JJ Ipsen. Recorded and mixed by Jim and JJ and mastered by Andy Magoffin at The House of Miracles. Album art by Arnaud De Bock. Big thanks to François Alliot, Leigh Alexander, Arnaud De Bock, Eric Van Amerongen and everyone at Nerial and Devolver Digital.

01. Long Live The Queen 00:58
02. To Rule with a Heavy Heart 01:22
03. The Gilded Finches 00:55
04. Shadows in the Throne Room 01:09
05. Have You Said Your Prayers 02:04
06. Fading Memory 02:16
07. Emotional Labor 02:01
08. Murmur of the Stars 02:25
09. The Smell of Dirt is In the Air 02:10
10. Mother's Grief 01:22
11. To Prove Herself 01:40
12. The Labyrinth of Green 01:52
13. And They Will Remember Her Name 02:25
14. Glittering Dust 02:18
15. Tick Tock Mother Clock 00:55
16. The March of Centuries 02:44
17. Is That For Me 01:15
18. Forever, Forever, Forever 01:57
19. He is Always Watching 02:34
20. My Time Will Come 01:59
21. Self-Care 02:27
22. Under Your Slippered Feet 02:05
23. True Power 02:30
24. I'll Do My Crying in the Reigns, Too 03:00

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo T5600 (2 * 1830)
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo T5600 (2 * 1830)
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM

name: Reigns: Her Majesty Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 32-bit and 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo T5600 (2 * 1830)

short_description: Music by Jim Guthrie and JJ Ipsen.
